name: Bullet Trick
title: Chasca: Bullet Trick
in_play_description: Add 1 Shadowhunt Shell to your Hand.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Chasca to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Fast Action: When your Chasca is on the field, play this card on them. Add 1 Shadowhunt Shell to your Hand.
(You must have Chasca in your deck to add this card to your deck)
